Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text: Vice President

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Transit Access Waterfront Skytrain and Canada Line Station and Seabus Terminal
Desservi par les transports en commun Waterfront Skytrain and Canada Line Station and Seabus Terminal

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 141 Water Street is located in the heart of Gastown, between the famous Gastown Steam Clock and Maple Tree Square. Gastown is an iconic Vancouver neighbourhood that seamlessly combines the old with the new. Characterized by its cobblestone streets, heritage buildings, and abundant historical charm. It is home to multiple award-winning restaurants, trendy retail stores, and convenient amenities. Plus excellent transit access via Waterfront Station providing rapid access to all parts of the Lower Mainland.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | Rare 2 Level Strata Investment/Owner-User Opportunity

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Executive vice President

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: OFISWERKS by FORMWERKS, located at 234 West 3rd Avenue, is a newly developed AAA office and flex strata project in the heart of Mount Pleasant.  Formwerks Boutique Properties brings a timeless architectural presence to this evolving neighbourhood with classic, clean lines and industrial design elements that honour the history of the neighbourhood. The thoughtful design considers the future of tomorrow’s workplace, providing open concept plans with abundant natural light, natural shading through the use of green walls, and lush landscaping throughout. A second floor terrace, and gorgeous rooftop patio allow colleagues to unwind and reconnect while enjoying the picturesque city and mountain views. Building highlights include: 4,757 SF rooftop patio, end of trip facilities, loading doors, elevator, ceiling heights that range from 12' - 20', and 70 parking stalls including ample EV charging stations.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | MOUNT PLEASANT OFFICE & INDUSTRIAL STRATA

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Exclusive one of a kind offering in Mount Pleasant. Top floor private penthouse office suite on the highest point in Mount Pleasant, with glorious views facing north, west and south boasting the largest office patio available. Located in the heart of Mt. Pleasant, steps from the Canada Line, the Broadway Corridor, and 5 minutes from downtown, The Beltline Off Broadway at 224 West 8th Avenue is a contemporary office and flex space showcasing a strong industrial design with a sleek glass, concrete and steel exterior.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | PRIVATE STRATA PENTHOUSE OFFICE SUITE

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Vice Chairman
Vice President
Sales Representative

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located in Vancouver’s trendiest neighbourhood, The Yaletown Brickworks Building at 1228 Hamilton Street is one of the finest fully restored heritage office buildings in the area. The units range from 300 SF to full floors of 3,534 SF in size, totaling 8,866 SF over 3 floors, featuring gorgeous brick and beam interiors, playing homage to it’s historic roots while featuring modern improvements.   This central location is a 2-minute walk from the Yaletown Roundhouse Canada Line SkyTrain Station and multiple bus routes, allowing a seamless connection to all parts of downtown and the Lower Mainland. Highlights: fully improved brick and beam interior, building amenities, SkyTrain station nearby, parking stations, and amenity-rich neighbourhood.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | Yaletown's Finest Heritage Strata Office

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text: Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited and Oakwyn Realty are pleased to present this rare opportunity to acquire two combined luxurious move-in ready ground floor commercial units located at 106 & 107 – 1008 Beach Avenue in Vancouver, British Columbia. Totaling approximately 2,462 square feet, these combined units are designed and suitable for a chic owner-occupier or investor. Designed by SSDG Interiors Inc. in 2017, the units have been beautifully built out with over $1,000,000 of interior improvements which encompass rich materials with bespoke design elements that convey high-end sophistication. This collaborative workplace pushes boundaries; no single element was over looked to create this optimal and prestigious open floorplan layout and luxury design.

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The city designating Oakridge as a new town centre has provided us the opportunity to bring much needed new office capacity to a very tight market. Oakridge has historically been the medical and professional epicentre of the west side of Vancouver. On transit and in the geographical centre of the city, we have created a new opportunity to participate in direct ownership of workspace in Vancouver’s cultural hub and new town centre.
